summary: Makes all of the members of The Circle wear Wolf Armor.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]What it does:[/size]

This small plugin makes it so that Aela the Huntress and Farkas finally wear Wolf Armor. They no longer seem out of place, although good luck easily distinguishing Vilkas and Farkas. Also now adds gauntlets to Skjor.

[size=4]Requirements: [/size]

None

[size=4]Known Issues:

[size=3][size=2]Aela will reset back to the her Nord Armor after the quest where you become a werewolf. Fixing this is ingame, because I don't know why she does this, is as simple as opening the console (~), clicking on Aela, use the disable command and then the enable command. Voilla! [/size][/size]

Compatibility:[/size]

Any mod that makes changes to Aela and Farkas' default outfit will be incompatible. Also, the possibility of mods that change the name of Wolf Armor, of course this might not make an impact whatsoever.

[size=4]Recommended Mods:[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28688/?]Wolf Armor Redone [color=#ffffff]by [/color][/url]ELE08
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60136/?]Mellon-Vana ENB[/url] by DrDoctor
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34886/?]Lorkhans Vision - Night Sky [/url] by Doubloonz
author: hjj174

files.name: CompleteCircle-1.1
files.changelogHtml: Added Skjor to the affected NPC's.
